ref: Listen well, friend, Portal 2 is one of the greatest games of all time. It got a full-fleged release on PlayStation and comes with an amazingly perfect multiplayer mode.

ref: Oh man, Quantum Break could have been so much better for a 2016 game, but instead it ended up being no more than a forgettable one like most of them.
